channel.title: Posts on Florida Data Science
channel.description: Recent content in Posts on Florida Data Science

item.title: Florida Open Data
item.description: Open data in Florida As of February 2018, according to data.gov, 48 states have open data sites, and Florida is one of them.

item.title: Lenovo P51 - the Data Scientist's laptop
item.description: Recently, as part of a computer refresh, I have moved from a Microsoft Surface Pro 3 to a Lenovo P51. The Microsoft Surface Pro 3 was the right computer for me at the time I got it, but as time went by my position changed substantially, and it ceased to be appropriate for me. When I got the Surface, the core of my work consisted in traveling, having conference calls and light emailing and spreadsheet work.
